text: Maa nia daangada Israel ga hagalongo mai gi agu helekai huogodoo ge benebene Nnaganoho huogodoo ala ne wanga go dagu dangada hai hegau go Moses gi digaula, gei Au ga hagalee hai digaula gi hagabagia gi daha mo di gowaa dela ne wanga ko Au gi nadau maadua mmaadua.”21.8 1 Kings 9.3-5; 2 Kronikel 7.12-18
